prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with sleek black body and striking red accents.
I want a Pokemon that has insect-like features and can blend into forest environments.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that showcases agility and speed with a unique body shape.
Make a Pokemon with a shiny golden carapace and translucent wings that glimmer in sunlight.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a small bug into a swift flying creature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies stealth and speed with a distinct black and red color scheme.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas and has a unique ability to camouflage.
